title: Identify a Story Idea from Online Forums
description: A community manager is monitoring a local online forum and notices many people are complaining about a specific local issue, suggesting a potential story.

tasks.description: Monitor local online forums (e.g., Reddit, neighborhood Facebook groups) for trending topics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is aware of what the community is talking about.

tasks.description: Identify a recurring complaint or issue that is gaining traction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent spots a potential story lead.

tasks.description: Write a brief summary of the issue and the public sentiment around it.
Submit the story idea to the editorial team for consideration.
tasks.expected_outcome: The potential story lead is passed to the newsroom.
